items.sentence: If it\'s not raining, Tom usually walks to school.
I\'m kind of sleepy so I\'ll be heading back soon.
Tom said that he hoped to be back by October 20th.
Tom said that the mistake was due to an oversight.
When I entered Tom\'s room, he was reading a book.
Why don\'t we just do it now and get it over with?
I didn\'t realize you couldn\'t understand French.
Tom doesn\'t know exactly what he should be doing.
Why aren\'t you wearing those earrings I gave you?
Why didn\'t you let me know you were in Australia?
How much longer is Tom planning to live in Boston?
I don\'t think that there\'s anyone who hates Tom.
Do you have any idea what Tom was doing in Boston?
Mary has been wearing blue dresses a lot recently.
I\'ve got to stop Tom from doing something stupid.
I\'ve heard Tom is really good at speaking French.
I\'ve never been able to beat Tom at table tennis.
I don\'t think you could ever do that by yourself.
Tom decided to see if he could get into that club.
Every boy in the class wanted to sit next to Mary.
We\'re only asking you to help us for a few hours.
I don\'t know why Tom doesn\'t want to go with us.
Tom got into Mary\'s house through an open window.
Tom was supposed to leave for Australia on Monday.
I thought you said nobody here could speak French.
I told Tom that he should try to do it by himself.
Tom always goes back home to Boston for Christmas.
Where\'s the men\'s room? I want to wash my hands.
Tom and Mary promised me that they\'d wash my car.
You\'re the only person who did that, aren\'t you?
You\'re the tallest boy in our class, aren\'t you?
You\'re three years younger than Tom, aren\'t you?
The longer you wait, the worse it\'s going to get.
You should tell Tom that Mary is going to do that.
Tom told me that he didn\'t like living in Boston.
Tom watered the tree that he\'d just transplanted.
I think I wouldn\'t enjoy playing tennis with Tom.
Tom didn\'t expect to hear back from Mary so soon.
It doesn\'t look like you guys are having any fun.
What kind of things does Tom do that irritate you?
Tom wasn\'t in the mood to accept Mary\'s apology.
I thought you knew Tom was going to be here today.
Tom wanted Mary and John to go to Boston with him.
Tom wanted Mary to understand why he had to leave.
Tom says he\'ll be sticking around for a few days.
Would you go back to Boston if you had the chance?
Tom loves himself more than he loves anybody else.
It seems like Tom doesn\'t really want to do this.
Tom has been unemployed for the past three months.
Tom has had so many chances to do the right thing.
